name: Taibai Gold Mansion
desc: A Gold-element cave dwelling deep in the Qingfeng Mountains
sub_type: where Gold essence qi condenses and the sound of swords never ceases; it is the supreme holy land for Gold-attribute cultivators.

name: Qingmu Grotto-Heaven
desc: A Wood-element cave dwelling in the Qingyun Forest
sub_type: full of vitality and spiritual herbs; it is the supreme holy land for Wood-attribute cultivators.

name: Xuanshui Secret Realm
desc: A Water-element cave dwelling deep in the boundless azure sea
sub_type: with ten thousand miles of blue waves and Water essence for soul condensation; it is the supreme holy land for Water-attribute cultivators.

name: Lihuo Cave Dwelling
desc: A Fire-element cave dwelling beside the Lava Volcano
sub_type: with flames reaching the sky and pure true fire; it is the supreme holy land for Fire-attribute cultivators.

name: Houtu Mystic Palace
desc: A Earth-element cave dwelling in the Qingfeng Mountains
sub_type: where thick earth carries all things and mountains resonate; it is the supreme holy land for Earth-attribute cultivators.

name: Guyue Ruins
desc: Ancient ruins deep in the rainforest
root_type: where Wood-element and Gold-element spiritual qi blend. Contains ancient cultivation techniques and spiritual herb formulas.

name: Canghai Ruins
desc: Ancient civilization ruins submerged in the sea
sub_type: with dense Water-element spiritual qi; treasures occasionally appear during the tides.
